      • getCurrentUserTypeOrdinal

        public int getCurrentUserTypeOrdinal()
        get current user type as Integer
        Returns:
        0 - NOT 1 - USER 2 - ADMIN

      • getCurrentUserType

        public UserData.UserType getCurrentUserType()

      • existsUser

        public UserData.UserType existsUser(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password)
        checks if the user exists in this user - password constellation
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        password - users password
        Returns:
        NOT - if it doesn't exist USER - if normal user ADMIN - if admin

      • saveUser

        public boolean saveUser(java.lang.String username,
               java.lang.String password,
               UserData.UserType type)
        saves a new user
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        password - password of user
        type - user type ADMIN or USER
        Returns:
        false - if user already exists / couldn't save

      • changePassword

        public boolean changePassword(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String newPassword)
        changes the password of user with username
        Parameters:
        username - name of user
        newPassword - new password of user
        Returns:
        false - if user doesn't exist / password isn't changed

      • deleteUser

        public boolean deleteUser(java.lang.String username)
        deletes the user with this name
        Parameters:
        username - name of the user to delete
        Returns:
        false - if user try to delete himself / user doesn't exist / user isn't deleted

      • getUsers

        public java.lang.String[][] getUsers()
        get all users with name and type
        Returns:
        [i][j] i = nth user, j = 0 user name, j = 1 user type as Integer

      • saveChangesInXML

        public void saveChangesInXML()
        saves the user list users in the xml data
